Name: NRG
About the game: A Platforming Revolution See everything, everywhere, all at once! With a view of the entire stage the whole time, you can choose to engage with your opponents or keep your distance to collect energy. Zombots Coming Around! Single and co-op game modes facing hordes of zombie robots. Climb the leaderboards! A New Spin On Celebration Taunting and doing finishing moves is an awesome part of any game but it never really matters , you know? Well it does now! Low on energy? Taunt to bring it up! Just take down another player? Do a finishing move on them for a huge reward! Careful though, because while doing either you'll be vulnerable to attacks, so choose wisely. Turning Customization Up To 11 What's the point of having your very own little robot dude if you can't make him look exactly how you want? From hats to shoes and everything in-between, we want to give you the freedom to make your character yours . We'll be consistently updating the store with more items and animations for you to pick from! We can't think of any more puns :( You might say... We've come full circle ? Aye!
